title: Live the Uptown urban lifestyle you crave!
description: Move right into this bright and sunny rehab in a prime Art Museum area location!   This beautiful fresh total renovation checks all of the boxes! Walk into the spacious open floor plan with high ceilings, modern metal railings,  and hardwood floors throughout. Separate dining area leads into the open kitchen with beautiful backsplash and abundant cabinet space. Private yard off of the dining room- perfect for grilling!   The lovely second floor features two large bedrooms with good closet space, recessed lighting, and large windows. Stylish hall bath with stunning tile work and large tub.   Spacious finished basement with high ceilings, windows, half bath, and laundry.   This  delightful home is steps from the Art Museum, a short walk from Center City, and has easy access to bus routes and running trails. It is surrounded by local amenities like coffee shops, bars and restaurants, community garden, Kelly Drive and the river, Fairmount Park, and world renowned museums. Fairmount offers a unique opportunity to live in a thriving community with plentiful green space in the heart of the city!

description: Welcome to this absolutely charming 3-bedroom 2.2 bath one-of-a-kind Carriage Style House tucked in a private tranquil setting creating the best of both worlds, an opportunity to own your own personal retreat near Wissahickon Valley Park with convenient access to city Philadelphia, this amazing residence exudes warmth , character and has been mindfully and meticulously maintaining with creative touches and timeless quality finishes, detailed millwork, deep window sills , high ceilings on the 1st floor, 2 car attached garage and multiple behind the scenes upgrades and features. The 2nd floor offers a spacious primary bedroom with dressing area and updated primary bedroom bath, there are two additional bright airy bedrooms accented with beautiful millwork and wood floors and a hall bathroom. The bucolic private rear yard includes a custom designed gazebo and patio perfect for entertaining or to read your favorite book in a serene picturesque setting and a labyrinth with a firepit. Additional features include second floor laundry, radiant heat in the kitchen and the newly renovated 2017 hall bathroom. The Walkout basement includes a potting area, 2 car attached garage and gas heat boiler 2010, tankless gas hot water heater, replaced gutters, this property evokes feelings of sacred space and historically fertile grounds as early century owners were the community’s farmers and produce growers. title: This spacious second floor 1 bedroom/1 bathroom.
description: Welcome to 262 Valley Stream Lane! This spacious second floor 1 bedroom/1 bathroom is completely renovated with an extraordinary modern flair and is ready for immediate occupancy. It is located in the sought-after Valley Stream community of Chesterbrook and backs to a wooded setting with private views from the balcony. Enter into the foyer with coat closet and exquisite engineered Tigerwood hardwood flooring that continues throughout all rooms, hallways and closets. You will also notice how beautifully bright this unit is with natural light complimented by recessed lighting. The living room features a designer built-in storage and entertainment center and custom fireplace in etched smoked glass and brushed nickel surrounded by a floor-to-ceiling porcelain tile design. Act fast to get in on carefree condo living in this move-in condition home!

title: This modern 3-story home offers 4 beds, 3 full baths
description:
Set on a tree-lined block in philly's graduate hospital neighborhood, you'll find 728 s 18th st. This modern 3-story home offers 4 beds, 3 full baths, 2 half baths, a finished basement, and three outdoor spaces: a patio, a roof deck, and a balcony off the primary bathroom. The home's main level is completely open, with beautiful hardwood floors extending throughout. A gas fireplace centers the living area, where tall windows fill the space with natural light. A hanging light fixture helps define the separate dining area. Past a powder room, the stunning chef's kitchen is adorned with high-gloss wood grain cabinetry, granite counters, wolf & sub-zero appliances, a pantry, and a center island with seating and a wine fridge. Out back, the secluded patio is the perfect spot to relax with a morning cup of coffee or an evening glass of wine. The finished lower has a bonus space, ideal for a home theater or playroom, a full bathroom, a huge bedroom, and storage closets. On the home's second level, two large bright bedrooms with excellent closet space sit at opposite ends, flanking a full bathroom and laundry closet at the center. The third level is dedicated to the primary suite. There's a spacious bedroom framed by bay windows, two custom walk-in closets, and a luxurious ensuite bathroom equipped with a double vanity, a glass-enclosed massaging rainfall shower, and access to a peaceful balcony. Finishing the home is a wet bar and powder room that lead to the expansive roof deck. With tons of space to spread out and picturesque views, it just needs a personal touch to be transformed into an entertainer's paradise or a garden oasis. 728 s 18th st's smart-home features include hardwired speakers throughout and app-controlled security and climate. In addition to all that's inside, this fantastic location earns a walk score of 99! It's close to shopping and dining on south st, the extensive schuylkill river trail, and idyllic rittenhouse square. Kid-friendly marian anderson park is a block away - with an awesome pool for the summer months. Public transit makes getting around the city easy, plus there's quick access to the university of penn, washington ave, and i-76. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!

title: A quintessential example of the art deco exuberance
description:
Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center city philadelphia apartments near rittenhouse square be a part of history! Icon mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theâ national register of historic places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown philadelphia apartment nearâ rittenhouse square? You've found it! Icon is the most exciting rental property to ever grace rittenhouse square. A quintessential example of the art deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, icon's design is inspired by art deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, icon is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the great depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both cunard's white star line and the united states lines, and the esteemed pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th floor. Today, this history echoes throughout icon, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its art deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Â stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of philadelphia. Enhanced penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair accessible apartments available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: sky deck with 360 view, includes grilling station and outdoor living area with fireplace . Wellness floor featuring a yoga studio, cardio, weights, trx & boxing . Private dining room with fireplace and serving kitchen. Club level with kitchen, billiards, flat-screen tvs and large screen. Media room for private parties. Business center with computers, printers, conference rooms with a/v capabilities. Media roomâ . Full service concierge. Parking garage w/ valet parking option. Package receiving. Pet grooming station. On site property management. Elevator. Charging stations for electric cars. Cold storage for grocery delivery. 24 hour emergency maintenance. Pets welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-site green drop donation box. ** pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** photos are of model units ** parking may be available for additional fee **

title: This modern 3-story home offers 4 beds, 3 full baths
description:
Set on a tree-lined block in philly's graduate hospital neighborhood, you'll find 728 s 18th st. This modern 3-story home offers 4 beds, 3 full baths, 2 half baths, a finished basement, and three outdoor spaces: a patio, a roof deck, and a balcony off the primary bathroom. The home's main level is completely open, with beautiful hardwood floors extending throughout. A gas fireplace centers the living area, where tall windows fill the space with natural light. A hanging light fixture helps define the separate dining area. Past a powder room, the stunning chef's kitchen is adorned with high-gloss wood grain cabinetry, granite counters, wolf & sub-zero appliances, a pantry, and a center island with seating and a wine fridge. Out back, the secluded patio is the perfect spot to relax with a morning cup of coffee or an evening glass of wine. The finished lower has a bonus space, ideal for a home theater or playroom, a full bathroom, a huge bedroom, and storage closets. On the home's second level, two large bright bedrooms with excellent closet space sit at opposite ends, flanking a full bathroom and laundry closet at the center. The third level is dedicated to the primary suite. There's a spacious bedroom framed by bay windows, two custom walk-in closets, and a luxurious ensuite bathroom equipped with a double vanity, a glass-enclosed massaging rainfall shower, and access to a peaceful balcony. Finishing the home is a wet bar and powder room that lead to the expansive roof deck. With tons of space to spread out and picturesque views, it just needs a personal touch to be transformed into an entertainer's paradise or a garden oasis. 728 s 18th st's smart-home features include hardwired speakers throughout and app-controlled security and climate. In addition to all that's inside, this fantastic location earns a walk score of 99! It's close to shopping and dining on south st, the extensive schuylkill river trail, and idyllic rittenhouse square. Kid-friendly marian anderson park is a block away - with an awesome pool for the summer months. Public transit makes getting around the city easy, plus there's quick access to the university of penn, washington ave, and i-76. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!

title: Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments.
description:
Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center city philadelphia apartments near rittenhouse square be a part of history! Icon mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theâ national register of historic places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown philadelphia apartment nearâ rittenhouse square? You've found it! Icon is the most exciting rental property to ever grace rittenhouse square. A quintessential example of the art deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, icon's design is inspired by art deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, icon is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the great depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both cunard's white star line and the united states lines, and the esteemed pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th floor. Today, this history echoes throughout icon, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its art deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Â stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of philadelphia. Enhanced penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair accessible apartments available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: sky deck with 360 view, includes grilling station and outdoor living area with fireplace . Wellness floor featuring a yoga studio, cardio, weights, trx & boxing . Private dining room with fireplace and serving kitchen. Club level with kitchen, billiards, flat-screen tvs and large screen. Media room for private parties. Business center with computers, printers, conference rooms with a/v capabilities. Media roomâ . Full service concierge. Parking garage w/ valet parking option. Package receiving. Pet grooming station. On site property management. Elevator. Charging stations for electric cars. Cold storage for grocery delivery. 24 hour emergency maintenance. Pets welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-site green drop donation box. ** pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** photos are of model units ** parking may be available for additional fee **

title: Welcome to The Grande in Conshohocken.
description: Welcome to The Grande in Conshohocken. This beautiful, spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bath condo is ready for you! The entrance foyer has hardwood floors, a large closet/pantry and an oversized double closet with a new washer & dryer. The kitchen, which opens to the living area, has a breakfast bar with Corian countertops, 42" cabinets, gas stove, microwave, and refrigerator. The bedroom overlooks the courtyard and includes a large walk-in closet. The bathroom has a large vanity and a tub with a shower. There are new carpets in the bedroom, a new washer and dryer, new water heater, refrigerator  and water expansion tank. This updated home is in impeccable condition and comes with one deeded garage space! Move right in and start enjoying this secure building with key fob access, surveillance system and trash/recycling chutes on every floor. Fee includes a gorgeous pool, new fitness center and new outdoor barbeque grills, fireplace and gathering spaces. Located in the heart of Conshohocken, you can walk to many excellent restaurants, shopping, offices and train. Entrance to the Schuylkill River Bike Trail is right behind the building. You can ride to Philadelphia or Valley Forge along the river. Enjoy easy access to major transportation routes, King of Prussia and Center City Philadelphia.

title: A beautiful 1-bedroom with a DEN Dresher condo at the Grande!
description: Welcome home to 300 W Elm St #2130, a beautiful 1-bedroom with a DEN Dresher condo at the Grande! living literally steps away from all of Fayette Streets shops and restaurants, this is a must see. Step inside to the impeccably maintained condo complete with the highly sought-after open floorplan. Neutral paint and flooring throughout is sure to please any decorating taste (or is the perfect blank canvas for those who want to add a vibrant splash of color!) Hardwood flooring is located in the entry way (where you will find the private laundry closet) and throughout the kitchen. The kitchen features 42” cabinetry, granite countertops, a breakfast bar, and stainless steel appliance package (refrigerator, gas range, built-in microwave and dishwasher). The breakfast bar is ideal to grab a quick weeknight meal or use as the snack-hub when hosting. The spacious living room comes complete with plush carpeting, recessed lighting and glass sliders that allow loads of natural light to stream inside. The patio is large enough to add a comfy chair or two to enjoy the outdoors this spring and summer, and also features two separate closets. Throw down an outdoor rug, add some potted plants and get ready to enjoy your own outdoor oasis. The bedroom receives excellent natural lighting and is accented with crown molding. The large walk-in closet provides all the space you need for clothes and accessories. The bathroom features tile floors, over-sized one sink vanity, a tub shower with glass sliders and additional shelving space for towels. The best part about this 1-bedroom floorplan? The added den space! Great for those who work from home and need a home office, set up as a cozy reading area, add a peloton and some weights for your own work-out studio or use as a guest bedroom when friends and family need to stay over. Parking is a breeze! This condo includes a 1 car garage parking space and there is a huge parking lot for overflow parking. The community pool is located in the courtyard of this building. There are BBQ areas scattered throughout the community and the fitness center is located in building 350 right next door. Easy access to the Schuylkill River Bike Trail and the Septa Train Station.

title: Filter Sq 3 bed 2 bath home with patio, W/D, C/A & more!
description:
515 S. 27th Street
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

title: 2 BR luxury: live above the Gold Standard in University City!
description:
Luxury renovation in the Cedar Park neighborhood of University City, West Philly!  The entire light-filled 3rd floor, over 1100 square feet, with cute little Juliet balconies and views from huge windows on 3 sides of the apartment. The contemporary kitchen features stainless steel appliances, Corian counter tops and lots of cabinet space. Two very large BRs, completely rehabbed bath, living room overlooking the Avenue. Lovely refinished oak parquet floors. Leaded glass. Washer & dryer in the apartment.
Located on the vibrant Baltimore Ave. commercial corridor, famous for the Dollar Stroll. The Gold Standard Cafe is on the first floor of the building - great take-out/ dine in, right downstairs!  Other nearby dining options include Vientiane Café, Dahlak, Gojjo, Loco Pez, Lee’s Deli, Vietnam Café, and Fiesta Pizza. On 47th St., Fu-Wah Market sells Vietnamese hoagies, groceries and gourmet treats.  The #34 trolley out front will whisk you to center city in 15 minutes, stopping at UPenn, Drexel U, the 30th St. transportation center along the way. The UPenn bus route stops at the corner.
(Owner is a PA real estate licensee.)

title: A free-standing home with a stately presenc
description:
Now available for rent! 2012 poplar is indeed a coveted rarity with over 3,000 square feet of light-filled, gracious living space, in the heart of a thriving art museum neighborhood. A free-standing home with a stately presence, this four bedroom, 4.5 bath gem boasts expansively-proportioned rooms, high ceilings, and open-concept city living at its finest. The main live space is warm and comfortable, with striking hardwood floors, elegant crown molding, recessed lighting, and a peak through to the lush green from the stunning garden at the rear of the home. The european-style kitchen is absolutely the focal point of the first floor. Custom cabinetry, classic white marble countertops, stainless appliances including a beautiful aga range, farmhouse sink, convenient breakfast bar, and statement pendant lighting. The spacious dining room boasts gorgeous views of the garden, a private, fully enclosed oasis of lush landscaping and year round enjoyment. A convenient powder room completes the first floor of this lovely home. Upstairs, a large and light-filled owner's suite sits at the front of floor two, which boasts the same striking hardwood flooring. Plentiful closets and an elegant marble bath with dual sink and oversized shower. A second spacious bedroom and full bath complete this floor. 2012 offers unique flexibility, as floor three of the home boasts a third expansive bedroom which might also be an owner's suite. A fourth classic bedroom and a full bath, and those gorgeous hardwood floors complete the third floor. Up a quick flight to sweeping panoramic city skyline views and tremendous open-air entertainment space from the fabulous rooftop deck. Expanding the home's value exponentially, the lower level is completely and beautifully finished, replete with a higher ceiling, comfortable living area, spacious bedroom and full bath, excellent storage, and laundry. And yes, those stunning hardwood floors! Simply an exceptional, loved property in every way, in a walkable neighborhood surrounded by art and culture, fine and casual dining, shopping, easy access to transportation, the schuylkill river trail, fairmount park, and so much more. A unique opportunity for a very special home.
2012 poplar st

title: Located within an elegant brownstone
description:
Located within an elegant brownstone in a vibrant section of washington square west, you will be wowed by this gorgeous 2 bedrooms, 2 bathroom condo. The kitchen offers ample sleek cabinetry, high end stainless appliances, quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash and a large quartz island with breakfast bar illuminated by beautiful custom pendant lighting and a large pantry which also houses the full size washer and dryer. The living room is large, great for entertaining and also has additional closet space for coats and storage. Down the hallway towards the living quarters you'll arrive at the first full bathroom featuring stylish wallpaper, large tub/ shower and a beautiful vanity with gold fixtures.. At the end of the hallway you will reach the two bedrooms. The primary bedroom offers two large windows, contemporary, wood ceiling fan, recessed lighting, custom closets and a decorative (non working) fireplace with marble mantel. The primary bathroom includes a beautiful dual vanity with gold fixtures, quartz counters and tub / shower. The second bedroom offers a ceiling fan and custom closet and can also be used as a home office or gym. An opportunity to own a flawless condo in a great area will not last long. Steps away from everything center city, philadelphia has to offer from amazing restaurants, nightlife, entertainment and close to public transportation and pennsylvania and jefferson hospitals. title: Charming One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
